name: Happy Hour
description: Happy Hour is a beautiful, mobile-friendly theme that is versatile enough for many different types of online retailers. One thing that makes it unique is that it features a single product at the top of the homepag. Developer friendly, it uses a set of modern, lightweight, easy-to-use, and open source tools and prebuilt components for building LemonStand themes, including Sass, Bourbon and Neat, Bitters and Refills, and Gulp.
excerpt: Happy Hour is a mobile-friendly theme that's versatile enough for a wide range of retailers.
